mapper.insert: insert into assignments(user_id, course_id, assignment_url) values (#{userId}, #{courseId}, #{assignmentUrl});
mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.name, COUNT(a.assignment_id) AS num_of_assignments FROM course c LEFT JOIN assignments a ON c.course_id = a.course_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} and a.statu = 0 GROUP BY c.course_id, c.name;
